name: DISCRETE_PAT_INSTRUCTIONS
description: This table contains the insulin treatment instructions for patients.

columns.name: DISCRETE_PAT_INSTR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the instructions name record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...)

columns.name: DISCRETE_PAT_INSTR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of patient instructions stored in this record

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date the record was created
